hero.title: Audio to Text – Convert audio to text & subtitles instantly
hero.description: Upload audio files or paste links, get a 5-minute preview instantly, then unlock the full transcription. Supports MP3, M4A, WAV, OGG with automatic language detection and bilingual output options.
hero.tip: Free 5-minute preview • Auto language detection • 24h auto-delete

how_it_works.description: Three simple steps to convert your audio to text with high accuracy

items.title: Get 5-minute preview
items.description: See TXT/SRT preview instantly to verify quality before full processing

items.title: Download full transcription
items.description: Get complete transcription and download in your preferred format

tool_description.title: Audio to Text Online
tool_description.description: Perfect for podcasts, course recordings, interviews, and voice memos. Our AI automatically detects the spoken language and transcribes with high accuracy.

items.title: Multi-format Support
items.description: Upload files up to several hours long in MP3, M4A, WAV, OGG, or FLAC formats.

items.title: Bilingual Transcription
items.description: Choose bilingual transcription for mixed-language content, with optional translation features.

items.title: Speaker Separation
items.description: Advanced features like speaker separation (diarization) help identify different voices in conversations.

export_formats.description: Choose from multiple output formats to suit your workflow and requirements

items.title: JSON

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Audio to Text FAQ
faq.description: Common questions about audio transcription and our service

items.title: How to convert audio to text online?
items.description: Upload your MP3, M4A, WAV, or OGG file, or paste a direct audio link. Get a 5-minute preview to verify accuracy, then unlock the complete transcription with timestamps.

items.title: What audio formats are supported?
items.description: We support MP3, M4A, WAV, OGG, and FLAC formats. Audio files up to several hours long are processed efficiently with high accuracy.

items.title: Does it support multiple languages and translation?
items.description: Yes! Our system auto-detects the spoken language and can provide bilingual transcriptions. Translation features and speaker separation are available on monthly plans.

items.title: Can you separate different speakers?
items.description: Speaker separation (diarization) is available on monthly subscriptions. It identifies different voices and labels them as Speaker 1, Speaker 2, etc. in the transcript.

items.title: How is my privacy protected?
items.description: Audio files are deleted after 24 hours automatically. Transcripts are kept for 7-30 days and can be deleted manually. All processing happens securely with enterprise-grade encryption.

brand.title: V2TX
brand.description: Convert videos and audio to text online. Free 5-minute previews, multiple export formats including SRT, TXT, VTT, DOCX, and JSON.
